analysis.description:
Reentrancy in AgiCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#420-464):
	External calls:
	- forwardFunds(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#439)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#439)
	- msg.sender.transfer(weiToReturn) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#443-445)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contribution (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#453-456)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#453)

Reentrancy in AgiCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#498-515):
	External calls:
	- vault.close() (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#504)
	- token.unpause() (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#505)
	- token.transferOwnership(owner) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#508)
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#510)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/3/0xc4aad17558fa95c8937d0856b2dad74c1a7a095f.sol#511)
